info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:49PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A couple of strong thunderstorms will move east across southern Pender and northern New Hanover counties through 315 PM EDT... At 249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms Cape Fear Community College North Campus to Castle Hayne, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Torrential rain. Dangerous lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Surf City, Figure Eight Island, Hampstead, Topsail Beach, Cape Fear Community College North Campus, Wrightsboro, Rocky Point, Murrayville, Topsail, Castle Hayne, Bayshore, Scotts Hill, Ogden, Porters Neck, Woodside, Edgecomb, Wilmington International Airport and Kings Grant. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 407 and 416. Interstate 140 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
